text: Call Me by Your Name is a 2017 Italian American French Brazilian romantic drama movie directed by Luca Guadagnino and was based on the 2007 novel of the same name by André Aciman (who also stars). It stars Armie Hammer, Timothée Chalamet, Michael Stuhlbarg, Amira Casar, Esther Garrel, Victorie Du Bois and was nominated for 4 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 2018. ==Other websites== * Category:2017 drama movies Category:2017 romance movies Category:2010s romantic drama movies Category:2010s LGBT movies Category:Italian LGBT movies Category:Italian romance movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:French LGBT movies Category:French romance movies Category:French drama movies Category:Brazilian LGBT movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Luca Guadagnino Category:Movies set in the 1980s Category:Movies set in Italy
title: Call Me by Your Name (movie)
